ingredients: 100 grams/3.5 ounces kale, washed and with the tough stalks discarded
smallish bunch of basil (at least 25 or so leaves)
a good handful of walnuts (about ¼ cup)
a couple of good squeezes of lemon juice (add more to taste)
about 2 tablespoons good quality olive oil
about 140 grams/5 ounces cherry tomatoes on the vine (weight including the vine – or about 100 grams/3.5 ounces off the vine)
